description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nProjection:
After an adjacent ally {ACTION_attacks}, {ACTION_casts} a spell, {ACTION_defends}, or {ACTION_provokes}, this creature has a 50% chance to perform that action as well. This trait does not work on creatures that also have this trait.
name: Wireframe Matrix
